required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: TMS in Treatment of Schizophrenia Negative Symptoms
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of High-frequency Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation With H7-coil in the Treatment of Schizophrenia Negative Symptoms; A Multicenter, Randomized, Sham Controlled, Triple Blind Trial

brief_summary.textblock:
Primary objective: to examine the efficacy and safety of high frequency repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation (HF rTMS) with H7-coil applied once daily during the twenty days, augmentative to the standard antipsychotic pharmacotherapy and other treatment of negative symptoms in schizophrenia.
Targeted population: patients diagnosed with schizophrenia, 18-55 years old with predominant negative symptoms, stable condition for >3 months and unchanged antipsychotic therapy for >1 months and no treatment with antidepressants.
Study design: industry independent, multicenter, prospective randomized sham-controlled, two-arms, triple-blind superiority clinical trial with concealed allocation and masked independent outcome assessment.
Primary outcome: adjusted median of differences in total SANS score. Adjustment for age, gender, baseline total SANS score, duration of the disorder, and antipsychotic therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Adjusted median of differences in total SANS score
primary_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
primary_outcome.description: Adjusted median of differences in total SANS score (Andreasen, 1989). We will adjust the medians for age, gender, baseline total SANS score, duration of the disorder, and antipsychotic therapy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Self-Evaluation of Negative Symptoms Scale (SNS) (Dollfus, Mach and Morello, 2016)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Brief Negative Symptom Scale (BNSS), (Kirkpatrick et al., 2006)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in PANSS negative symptom subscale with items rescaled to 0-6 range
secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in PANSS negative symptoms subscale with items rescaled to 0-6 range, (Kay, Fiszbein and Opler, 1987)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in depressive symptoms measured using Calgary Depression Scale for Schizophrenia (CDSS) (Addington, Addington and Schissel, 1990)

other_outcome.measure: The number of patients self-reported side effects during therapy, confirmed by the medical nurse
other_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
assessed up to 20 days of treatment
other_outcome.description: Change in verbal memory using Auditory Verbal Learning Test (AVLT), subtest from Wechsler Memory Scale (Revised)-Verbal-Logical Memory

other_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
other_outcome.description: Change in visual memory using Benton's visual retention test (BVRT)

other_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
other_outcome.description: Change in numeric memory using subtest from Wechsler Memory Scale (Revised)-Digit Span

other_outcome.measure: Change in visual-spatial abilities and executive function
other_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
other_outcome.description: Change in visual-spatial abilities and executive function using TMT (A/B) Trail Making Test, and subtest from Wechsler Intelligence Scale (Revised)-Block Design

other_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
other_outcome.description: Change in psihomotor speed using subtest from Wechsler Intelligence Scale (Revised)-Digit Symbol Substitution Test

other_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
other_outcome.description: Change in verbal fluency using FAS Verbal Fluency Test

other_outcome.measure: Change in recognition of facial expressions of emotions
other_outcome.time_frame: assessed up to 20 days of treatment
other_outcome.description: Change in recognition of facial expressions of emotions using the Penn's Emotion Recognition Task test (ER40)

intervention.description: high frequency repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation (HF rTMS) with H7-coil applied once daily during the twenty days
SHAM HF rTMS coil once daily x 20 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Confirmation diagnosis of schizophrenia (ICD-10 F20) using the Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview (MINI) (Lecrubier et al., 1997; Sheehan et al., 1998),
2. Age 18-55 years,
3. Both genders,
4. PANSS negative symptoms subscale score >24,
5. PANSS positive symptoms subscale score <20,
6. Stable condition (no acute psychosis exacerbation, no psychiatric hospitalization because of relapse or worsening of symptoms) during at least three months,
7. Stable antipsychotic therapy with no change of drugs or doses during the one months before the enrollment.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Antipsychotics dose change or change of antipsychotic drug,
2. Hospitalization for somatic illness in another institution,
3. Termination of treatment in a Psychiatric Hospital "Sveti Ivan",
4. Pregnancy,
5. Missed more than three consecutive interventions,
6. Withdrawal of consent to participate for the sake of intolerance of TMS or for other reasons.
